channel.title: Posts on Shadow Pioneer
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Shadow Pioneer

item.title: Moving to Hugo
item.author: admin@shadowpioneer.com (Dustin Plunkett)
item.description: What is this? A change to a different platform? So I’ve decide to give Hugo a try for my main blogging platform. There are numerous reasons for this, mostly cost involved. I’ll be able to move all of my sites from an expensive VM, to cheap AWS buckets. As for this site, for now at least, it’s actually going to be hosted on Gitlab. At least for now. There are a lot of changes to be made, and a lot of learning, however it should be a fun experience.

item.title: Like a sucker punch out of left field
item.author: admin@shadowpioneer.com (Dustin Plunkett)
item.description: Something has been bothering me a lot lately. I couldn’t quite put my finger on it. I haven’t been sleeping well lately (which isn’t really that unusual), I’ve been scatterbrained (again, not that unusual) and really just couldn’t concentrate on anything. It really bugged me that I couldn’t quite put my finger on it. Anyone that knows me, knows I’m not one to talk about my feelings at all, good or bad.
